item.title: Iran supreme leader signals crackdown coming on protesters
item.description: Iran's judiciary chief has vowed decisive punishment for protesters, signaling a coming crackdown against demonstrations

item.title: Italy gives key support to fraught EU trade deal with South American nations
item.description: Italy has provided crucial support to plans by the European Union to seal a huge free trade deal with five South American nations

item.title: Lebanon signs gas exploration deal with international consortium amid economic crisis
item.description: Lebanon's government has signed a deal with an international consortium for gas exploration in an offshore area bordering Israel
